title: Thomas Lasvenes
text:
Thomas Lasvenes (born 6 May 1996) is a French <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer currently for <a href="Villeneuve%20Leopards">Villeneuve Leopards</a> in the <a href="Elite%20One%20Championship">Elite One Championship</a>. He is a . He previously played for the <a href="Limoux%20Grizzlies">Limoux Grizzlies</a> and represented <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a> in the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup%209s">2019 Rugby League World Cup 9s</a>.
Playing career.
Villeneuve XIII RLLG.
On 24 Jul 2019 it was reported that he had signed for <a href="Villeneuve%20XIII%20RLLG">Villeneuve XIII RLLG</a> in the <a href="Elite%20One%20Championship">Elite One Championship</a>
